questionTitle: Which of the following types is a Web-based version of the PowerPoint presentation program?
questionExplanation: Microsoft Office Live is aimed at individual, SOHO (Small Office/Home Office), and small business users.

questionOption1: Google Docs is Google’s online word processor
questionOption2: Using a feature called Google Gadgets, you can add functionality to various Google Docs modules
questionOption3: The central application in the Google Docs suite lets you upload documents, open documents, and share documents
questionExplanation: Gadgets can add an interactive motion chart or a temperature chart type to the spreadsheet.

questionTitle: Which of the following Storage component is used in Office Live Small Business?
questionExplanation: The fundamental feature of the service is the ability to store and share documents online.

questionTitle: Thinkfree Office is written in which of the following programming language?
questionExplanation: ThinkFree Office is one of the earliest of the online office suites to be released, first appearing in 2001.

questionOption1: Google’s event and time management application uses an Ajax interface to support drag and drop of events between dates and times
questionOption2: Google Calendar is thought to be the most widely used online calendar today
questionOption3: Files you save in SkyDrive do not store a version history and are searchable within the service
questionExplanation: Documents you create in SkyDrive and entire folders can be synchronized with other locations.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a component of Thinkfree Office suite?
questionExplanation: Through the use of the Power Edit applet for Write, Calc, and Show, a history of document versions is retained.

questionTitle: Which of the following Thinkfree Office component allows you to create a presentation program?
questionExplanation: Documents created in ThinkFree Online can be saved to your desktop, an online share, or a mobile workspace.

questionTitle: Which of the following collaboration feature in Thinkfree Office allow user to upload documents?
questionExplanation: Other users can then view the documents, spreadsheets, or presentations that are made available to them.

questionTitle: Which of the similar feature is not available in Zoho office suite relative to Google cloud suite?
questionExplanation: The Zoho Office Suite is one of the more highly regarded online office suites.

questionTitle: Which of the following file format is supported by Zoho Writer?
questionExplanation: Writer supports the following standard file formats: text (TXT), Microsoft Word (DOC), RTF, Office Open XML (DOCX), OpenDocument text (ODT), OpenOffice.org text (SXW), HTML, and image files.
